dialogueLines.line: Well, what do we have here?
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Could you show us how to get to the address on this flyer?
dialogueLines.speaker: pump

dialogueLines.line: I could offer you a ride there, but you'll have to make it worth my time.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: We can do the spooky dance if you want.
dialogueLines.speaker: skid
